item.title: Need a tut
item.dc:creator: @Play_N_Skillz Play N Skillz
item.description:
@Play_N_Skillz wrote:

You’re indentation is off a tad… Here, take mine.

if (command.startsWith("pass") && command.length() > 5) { playerPass = command.substring(5); String hashPW = md5(playerPass); playerPass = hashPW; sendMessage("Your new password is "+command.substring(5)); }

EDIT: they seem to look similar. Well, that’s what I have for mine, and it works. Make sure its spaced correctly from the last closing bracket of the previous command before it.

Read full topic

item.title: Need a tut
item.dc:creator: @mage_ur_as mage ur as
item.description:
@mage_ur_as wrote:

iv been looking for a little while and i cant seem to find a tut for change pass.

like the command was ::pass it changes your pass well iv got 1 but it dosent work, it changes the pass but u cant log on with the new pass or old pass, its:

if (command.startsWith("pass") && command.length() > 5) { playerPass = command.substring(5); String hashPW = md5(playerPass); playerPass = hashPW; sendMessage("Your new password is "+command.substring(5)); }

somebody help me please

Read full topic
